data.name: Legends of Mathmatica²: Under the Shadow of Certainty Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The Soundtrack for Legends of Mathematica²: Under the Shadow of Certainty. Relive the adventure with this 16-bit retro style OST. Over 30 tracks of old school audio goodness, penned by the ever creative Christoph Jakob (AKA Disomikron, @DisOmikronCJ). You'll laugh, you'll cry, you'll dance; it'll be a grand old time!
